snippet: Ordering a senior State Department official to leave is outrageous, calling into question Bahrain’s commitment to its alliance with the United States.
abstract: Editorial criticizes Bahrain for expelling Tom Malinowski, State Dept's assistant secretary for human rights, because he met with members of an opposition party; notes Bahrain also charged leader of the country's biggest opposition group for holding illegal meeting with Malinowski; urges Obama administration to condemn action and push Bahrain to be more serious about negotiating with Shiite majority.
lead_paragraph: Ordering a senior State Department official to leave is outrageous, calling into question Bahrain’s commitment to its alliance with the United States.

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Human Rights and Human Rights Violations

keywords.name: persons
keywords.value: Khalifa, Salman bin Hamad bin Isa al- (1969- )
